title: BC Partners to acquire Com Hem | Carlyle
snippet: I am convinced that we, with BC Partners as our new owner, will further develop our already strong position on the Swedish market”, says Tomas Franzén, CEO at Com Hem. Carlyle and Providence acquired Com Hem from EQT in 2006 and, in the same year, they acquired UPC, which was integrated with Com Hem.

title: BC Partners - Wikipedia
snippet: In August 2025, the firm attracted international scrutiny after leaked recordings showed executives of its portfolio company United Group discussing cooperation with state-owned Telekom Srbija and Serbian President Aleksandar Vučić in ways that could weaken United Media, the country’s last major independent broadcaster.
